name: Red Frontier Virgin
description: A non-alcoholic twist on the Red Frontier cocktail with cranberry, cola, grenadine, lime and mint.
flavorProfile: Fruity, sweet-tart, and refreshing with a citrus twist. Ideal as a mocktail or daytime refreshment.
instructions: Fill a glass with crushed ice.
Add cranberry juice, cola, grenadine, and lime juice.
